description: Detects potentially suspicious child processes of "regsvr32.exe".
author: elhoim
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Unlikely, but can rarely occur. Apply additional filters accordingly.
name: Potentially Suspicious Child Process Of Regsvr32
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\regsvr32.exe" AND process.executable.text:("*\\calc.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\explorer.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe" OR "*\\nltest.exe" OR "*\\notepad.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\reg.exe" OR "*\\schtasks.exe" OR "*\\werfault.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe")) AND (NOT (process.executable.text:"*\\werfault.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-u\ \-p\ *")))
